external_games.name: Evil Elves II: The Return of the Christmas Presents!

name: Evil Elves II: The Return of the Christmas Presents!
storyline:
The Evil Elves are at it again! They've stolen Santa's Christmas presents & have hid them in their Evil Elf Toy Shop!
Help Santa save Christmas by getting back all of the presents for the good little girls & boys!
But watch out for the Evil Toys that roam free inside the Evil Elf Terrible Toy Shop!
summary:
The Evil Elves have stolen Santa's Christmas presents and hidden them in their Terrible Toy Shop!
Help Santa save Christmas by finding all of the presents for the good little girls and boys!
